TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit DependencyResolver extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Contains static methods that add functions to use for resolving dependencies.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void ResolveUsing(class System.Func`3<class System.Type, object[], object> resolver) cil managed
static member ResolveUsing : Func<Type, obj[], obj> -> unit

Docs.param: A function that returns an instance of a type from an array that provides matching types, or if the type is not supported.
Docs.summary: Specifies a resolution function that attempts to return an instance of a specified type.
Docs.remarks: must return for types that it does not support, because a return value of passes the type through to Microsoft.Maui.Controls so that it may attempt to resolve the type itself.

Docs.param: A function that returns an instance of a type, or if the type is not supported.
Docs.summary: Specifies a resolution function that attempts to return an instance of the specified type.

remarks.para: must return for types that it does not support, because a return value of passes the type through to Microsoft.Maui.Controls so that it may attempt to resolve the type itself.
